entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as someone who is being listened to by Harry through a keyhole.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, suspected of making a mistake and having an enemy that no one knows about.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Aunt of Draco Malfoy, who has been teaching him Occlumency.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts, towards whom Draco had always shown respect and liking.

entities.name: bell girl
entities.description: Someone who is suspected of having an enemy that no one knows about.

relationships.description: Draco Malfoy shows respect towards Snape, even liking him.
Bellatrix is teaching Occlumency to Draco Malfoy.
Harry Potter is listening to a conversation between Snape and Draco Malfoy, where Harry suspects that Draco might be involved in something.
